properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 v4 v3 v5 v3 v6 v7 v8 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Our God is indescribable
His name is hallowed in the firmament
He’s the Passover Lamb through space and time

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
So from the pages of my heart
Let my worship begin but never end…oh oh oh
So from the pages of my heart
Let my worship begin but never end to the God of all flesh
For He’s my God and His name is Yahweh
His name is Yahweh, Yahweh

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Your majesty revealed to all
Your love is so so overwhelming
To your government, there is no end

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hallelujah Amen
Hallelujah Amen
Hallelujah Amen
Sing hallelujah Amen

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
You are the mighty God, the great I am
Hallelujah
Hallelujah

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Your name is a strong tower Jesus
To you belong all power Jesus
Whenever I call your name
You make a way
Your name is a strong tower

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Yeshua Hamasiach
Lion of Judah
Agunechemba

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
You are the God who parted who parted the red Sea
You are the God
You are the God
You are the God

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
You are the God who fight my battle
You are the God who fight my battle
You are the God
You are the God
You are the God
